```{r libraries}
library(ggplot2)
library(datasauRus)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r dataset}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    std_dev_x = sd(x),
    std_dev_y = sd(y),
    corr_x_y = cor(x, y)
  )
```

```{r linear regression}
x_shape_data <- datasaurus_dozen[datasaurus_dozen$dataset == "x_shape", ]
model <- lm(y ~ x, data = x_shape_data)
summary(model)
```

```{r linear regression plot}
ggplot(x_shape_data, aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  geom_point(color = "steelblue", size = 2, alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "red", linewidth = 1) +
  labs(title = "RegresiÃ³n Lineal: Datasaurus X-Shape", x = "X Values", y = "Y Values") +
  theme_minimal()
```
